content.prompt: Which of the following best explains the economic interest in China that Salisbury expresses in the passage?

choices.label: The greater wealth per capita of industrialized countries such as Britain compared to countries such as China
The dependence of industrialized countries on their colonies as sources of raw materials
The need for industrialized countries to secure export markets for their products
The transfer of European technologies such as railroads and steamships to non-European countries

topic.text: 7.9: Causation in 19th-Century Perspectives and Political Developments

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
